Close How to Use:
Organ Eyes is an application to help you, as a student, to organise yourself better. Be it your class work or extra-curricular activities this app is intended to help you by getting all your activities and obligations in one location for you.
To begin, open the drawer menu and select a category.\n\n
1. MILESTONES is an area in which you can jot down any notes regarding any sort of information, for example some topics you would like to study today or things to note for an upcoming event.
\n\n
2. SCHEDULES is where you take note of all classes, lectures, examinations, tests and CATs you may be having during the week.
\n\n
3. REMINDERS is clear, any reminders you would like to be notified about, e.g a pending assignment will be set here and you will be notified when the time arrives
\n\n
4. BUDGET is a special feature that allows you to plan your daily budget amount and will allow you to note down how much you spent on each day. It will provide daily totals and will notify you in the event that you overspend your budget, helping you to hopefully spend wiser and save money.
\n\n
Hopefully this application helps you to better organise yourself as a student and consequently you will begin to see improvement in your academic even non-academic life. An Organised mind will always prosper.
Have Fun!
